eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray} 
A''_I + A'_I \left( \sum_J d_J A'_J  + {\tilde{d}} B' + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
  &=& \frac{\sum_{i\in I} {\tilde{D}}_i(S'_i)^2 - \sum_{i\in \!\!\! / \, I} 
D_i(S'_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, 
\label{eqm_21} \\
  B'' + {\tilde{d}}(B')^2 + \frac{2{\tilde{d}}+1}{r}B' + (B' + \frac{1}{r}) \sum_I d_I A'_I
  &=& - \frac{\sum_i D_i(S'_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, \label{eqm_22} \\
  \phi''_\alpha + \phi'_\alpha \left( \sum_I d_I A'_I + 
{\tilde{d}} B' + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
  &=& -\frac{1}{2}\sum_i \varsigma_i a_{i\alpha} (S'_i)^2, 
\label{eqm_23} 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
{\tilde{d}} B'' - {\tilde{d}}(B')^2 - \frac{{\tilde{d}}}{r}B' + \sum_I d_I 
\left(A''_I -\frac{1}{r}A'_I-2A'_I B'+ (A'_I)^2 \right)
  + \frac{1}{2}\sum_\alpha (\phi'_\alpha)^2 &=& 
\frac{1}{2}\sum_i (S'_i)^2, \label{eqm_24} \\
  C''_i + C'_i \left( C'_i - \sum_{I:i\in I} d_I A'_I + 
\sum_{I:i \in \!\!\! / \, I} d_I A'_I + {\tilde{d}} B' + 
  \sum_\alpha a_{i\alpha} \phi'_\alpha + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
&=& 0, 
\label{eqm_25} 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
  \ddot{A}_I &=& \frac{\sum_{i\in I} {\tilde{D}}_i(\dot{S}_i)^2 - 
  \sum_{i\in \!\!\! / \, I} D_i(\dot{S}_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, \label{eqm_31} \\
  \ddot{\phi}_\alpha &=& 
  -\frac{1}{2}\sum_i \varsigma_i a_{i\alpha} (\dot{S}_i)^2, 
  \label{eqm_32}\\
  0 &=& \ddot{S}_i + \left(\sum_\alpha a_{i\alpha} \dot{\phi}_\alpha - 
  \sum_{I:i\in I} d_I \dot{A}_I \right)\dot{S}_i,
  \quad \mbox{(only elem.)} 
  \label{eqm_34} 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
A''_I + A'_I \left( \sum_J d_J A'_J  + {\tilde{d}} B' + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
  &=& \frac{\sum_{i\in I} {\tilde{D}}_i(S'_i)^2 - \sum_{i\in \!\!\! / \, I} 
D_i(S'_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, 
\label{eqm_21} \\
  B'' + {\tilde{d}}(B')^2 + \frac{2{\tilde{d}}+1}{r}B' + (B' + \frac{1}{r}) \sum_I d_I A'_I
  &=& - \frac{\sum_i D_i(S'_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, \label{eqm_22} \\
  \phi''_\alpha + \phi'_\alpha \left( \sum_I d_I A'_I + 
{\tilde{d}} B' + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
  &=& -\frac{1}{2}\sum_i \varsigma_i a_{i\alpha} (S'_i)^2, 
\label{eqm_23} 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
{\tilde{d}} B'' - {\tilde{d}}(B')^2 - \frac{{\tilde{d}}}{r}B' + \sum_I d_I 
\left(A''_I -\frac{1}{r}A'_I-2A'_I B'+ (A'_I)^2 \right)
  + \frac{1}{2}\sum_\alpha (\phi'_\alpha)^2 &=& 
\frac{1}{2}\sum_i (S'_i)^2, \label{eqm_24} \\
  C''_i + C'_i \left( C'_i - \sum_{I:i\in I} d_I A'_I + 
\sum_{I:i \in \!\!\! / \, I} d_I A'_I + {\tilde{d}} B' + 
  \sum_\alpha a_{i\alpha} \phi'_\alpha + \frac{{\tilde{d}}+1}{r} \right) 
&=& 0, 
\label{eqm_25} 
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
  \ddot{A}_I &=& \frac{\sum_{i\in I} {\tilde{D}}_i(\dot{S}_i)^2 - 
  \sum_{i\in \!\!\! / \, I} D_i(\dot{S}_i)^2}{2(D-2)}, \label{eqm_31} \\
  \ddot{\phi}_\alpha &=& 
  -\frac{1}{2}\sum_i \varsigma_i a_{i\alpha} (\dot{S}_i)^2, 
  \label{eqm_32}\\
  0 &=& \ddot{S}_i + \left(\sum_\alpha a_{i\alpha} \dot{\phi}_\alpha - 
  \sum_{I:i\in I} d_I \dot{A}_I \right)\dot{S}_i,
  \quad \mbox{(only elem.)} 
  \label{eqm_34}
